trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest"></xref> class defines the message digest of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the corresponding signer is not empty.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest"></xref> class.
This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest.MessageDigest"></xref> property retrieves the message digest.
An array of byte values that contains the message digest.
